text: @NYGovCuomo Take people from all over the country & world. Put them in environment combining indoor dining & bars, sleepaway camp & gyms and you have a college dorm. To even consider reopening dorms is NOT planning ahead or dealing w/reality @melissadderosa #NewYork #COVID19 #coronavirus
